refnamediv.refpurpose: Check if the message has specified type at the current location

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: sd_bus_message_verify_type() checks if the complete type at the current location in the message m matches the specified type and contents. If non-zero, parameter type must be one of the types specified in sd_bus_message_append1. If non-null, parameter contents must be a valid sequence of complete types. If both type and contents are specified type must be a container type.
If type is specified, the type in the message must match. If contents is specified, the type in the message must be a container type with this signature.

refsect1.title: Return Value
refsect1.para: On success, this call returns true if the type matches and zero if not (the message m contains different data or the end of the message has been reached). On failure, it returns a negative errno-style error code.

refsect2.title: Errors
refsect2.para: Returned errors may indicate the following problems:

listitem.para: m or both type and contents are NULL.
Arguments do not satisfy other constraints listed above.
